description: Sleek Simplicity with a Twist, Good Looks, Great Texture: Get an iPod case that celebrates understated style. The classic design with a translucent finish adds some aesthetic punch, while the innovative, flexible material will feel good in your hand. Protection that Fits: The thin, yet durable material is a stylish way to keep your iPod's surface free of scratches and scuffs, without adding extra bulk.
title: Belkin Essential 013 Case for Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation (Blacktop)
